body: At 5th level, as an immediate action, you can reroll any one d20 roll that you have just made before the results of the roll are revealed. You must take the result of the reroll, even if it's worse than the original roll. You can use this ability once per day at 5th level, and one additional time per day for every six oracle levels beyond 5th.
name: Fortune
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Oracle/Oracle Archetypes/Dual-Cursed Oracle/Revelations/Fortune
